attributes.action: force the FA to scrap any plans to develop the current senior England football team.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The F.A. should now focus on the 2010 FIFA World Cup with players that are under 25 this year. We then have 3 years to develop our squad to a high international standard with the up-coming players.

We should make use of the senior squad as trainers / mentors to allow the younger players to perfect their abilities.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
